item.title: Ethereum's Layer 2 Revolution: The Complete Guide to Scaling Solutions in 2025
item.description: Deep dive into Ethereum’s scaling ecosystem: comparing Optimism, Arbitrum, zkSync, and Polygon. Transaction costs dropped 99%, but which L2 should you actually use?
